file_insights.purpose: Configure executor with more flexible middleware support
Define configuration options for executor with flexible, extensible design

gotchas_discovered: Potential for resource exhaustion with unlimited concurrency
Need to handle nil middleware gracefully
Default configuration choices impact system behavior

approach_outcome.key_achievement: Created flexible, backward-compatible executor configuration mechanism

recommendations: Add comprehensive unit tests for each configuration option
Document performance implications of middleware chain and concurrency settings
Implement logging or metrics for middleware chain performance
